Articles.Content: Hi im Chowder7116!Ive been playing the Demo of KSP and decided to join the forums.Im loving this game!But one quick question.Will it always be 18$?Ive been trying to convince my dad to let me buy it since I dont have a credit card.Anyway..Glad to be here!

Hi Chowder, it'll actually become more expensive as time goes on, I am not aware of any plans for a sale at this point as the cost is a donation, rather than the price of the full game.

You'll be entitled to the full game when it is released if you donate though
Thanks for the welcome and information!
